name: Baltic
description:
## Game Summary

Antarctic Romp in the harsh cold and wind.

Single-player platformer where gloves and a scarf are definitely not optional.

## Social 

- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/glaikunt)

- [Itch](https://glaikunt.itch.io/)

## Controls

  WASD / Arrows - Movement

  Spacebar - Jump

## Objective

- Survive the harsh weather by making it to the next research station or warming up by a fire.

- Make your way to the seventh and last weather station.

## Credits

- All programming and art by Glaikunt [Twitter](https://twitter.com/glaikunt) and Vault101 [Twitter](https://twitter.com/vault101)

- Sound credits below
